get.summary: Retrieve a list of automation flows.
get.description: Retrieve a list of automation flows with optional pagination using the 'after' and 'limit' query parameters.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: A paging cursor token for retrieving subsequent pages.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return, with a default value of 100.

post.description: Create a new automation flow by providing the necessary details in the request body.

post.summary: Retrieve multiple automation flows in a single request.
post.description: Retrieve details of multiple automation flows by providing a batch of flow IDs in the request body. This endpoint allows for efficient retrieval of multiple flows at once, returning their details in a single response.

get.summary: Retrieve email campaigns for automation flows.
get.description: Retrieve a list of email campaigns associated with automation flows, with optional pagination using 'after', 'before', and 'limit' query parameters.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: A paging cursor token for retrieving subsequent pages.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: A paging cursor token for retrieving previous pages.

parameters.name: flowId
parameters.description: A query parameter to filter email campaigns by their associated flow IDs.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific automation flow using its unique flow ID.

parameters.name: flowId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the automation flow to be retrieved.

put.description: Update the details of an existing automation flow by providing the necessary information in the request body.

parameters.name: flowId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the automation flow to be updated.

delete.description: Delete an automation flow identified by its flow ID.

parameters.name: flowId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the automation flow to be deleted.

post.description: Retrieve mappings between flow IDs and workflow IDs in batch, allowing for efficient management of ID relationships.

hour.description: The hour component of the time, represented as an integer.

minute.description: The minute component of the time, represented as an integer.

propertyToken.description: The token used to identify the specific property of the fetched object.

type.description: Indicates the type of the fetched object property, which defaults to FETCHED_OBJECT_PROPERTY.

coalescingRefineBy.description: Defines the criteria for refining the property association, using one of several possible schemas such as PublicNumOccurrencesRefineBy or PublicRelativeComparativeTimestampRefineBy.

filterType.description: Indicates the type of filter, which defaults to PROPERTY_ASSOCIATION.

listId.description: The identifier of the list used in the property association filter.

operator.description: Specifies the operator used in the property association filter.

propertyWithObjectId.description: Specifies the property that includes the object ID for the filter.

toObjectTypeId.description: Represents the ID of the object type associated with the property association filter.

includeObjectsWithNoValueSet.description: Indicates whether objects without a value set should be included.

operationType.description: Specifies the type of operation, which defaults to 'STRING'.

operator.description: Defines the operator used in the string property operation.

value.description: The string value involved in the operation.

property.description: Specifies the name of the property being referenced.

referenceType.description: Indicates the type of reference used for the property.

timeType.description: Indicates the type of time reference, defaulting to 'PROPERTY_REFERENCED'.

timezoneSource.description: Specifies the source of the time zone information for the property-referenced time.

zoneId.description: Defines the time zone identifier for the property-referenced time.

name.description: Defines the name of the data source.

propertyName.description: Specifies the name of the property used in the enrolled record property filter.

recordFieldName.description: The name of the field in the record that is being filtered.

type.description: Indicates the type of data source, which defaults to ENROLLED_RECORD_PROPERTY_FILTER.

filterType.description: Indicates the type of filter, which defaults to PRIVACY.

operator.description: Specifies the operator used in the privacy analytics filter.

privacyName.description: The name associated with the privacy analytics filter.

datasetFieldName.description: Specifies the name of the dataset field used in the property filter.

name.description: Defines the name of the data source.

propertyName.description: Specifies the name of the property used in the dataset field property filter.

type.description: Indicates the type of data source, which defaults to DATASET_FIELD_PROPERTY_FILTER.

emailCampaignId.description: The unique identifier for the email campaign associated with the automation flow.

emailContentId.description: The unique identifier for the email content used in the email campaign.

flowId.description: The unique identifier for the automation flow associated with the email campaign.

day.description: Specifies the day of the week for the time window, with accepted values being: FRIDAY, MONDAY, SATURDAY, SUNDAY, THURSDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY.

actionId.description: The unique identifier for the webhook action.

authSettings.description: Defines the authentication settings for the webhook, which can include an authentication key or a signature.

method.description: Specifies the HTTP method to be used for the webhook request, with accepted values including CONNECT, DELETE, GET, HEAD, OPTIONS, PATCH, POST, PUT, TRACE.

type.description: Indicates the type of action, which defaults to WEBHOOK.

webhookUrl.description: The URL to which the webhook request will be sent.

flowId.description: The unique identifier for the flow associated with the workflow.

workflowId.description: The unique identifier for the workflow associated with the flow.

includeObjectsWithNoValueSet.description: Indicates whether objects without a value set should be included.

operationType.description: Specifies the type of operation, which defaults to 'MULTISTRING'.

operator.description: Defines the operator used in the multi-string property operation.

dayOfWeek.description: The day of the week in the week reference, with accepted values including: MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY, THURSDAY, FRIDAY, SATURDAY, SUNDAY.

hour.description: The hour component of the time in the week reference.

millisecond.description: The millisecond component of the time in the week reference.

minute.description: The minute component of the time in the week reference.

referenceType.description: Indicates the type of reference, defaulting to 'WEEK'.

second.description: The second component of the time in the week reference.

delta.description: The amount of time to delay, specified as an integer.

timeUnit.description: Defines the unit of time for the delay, with accepted values including: CENTURIES, DAYS, DECADES, ERAS, FOREVER, HALF_DAYS, HOURS, MICROS, MILLENNIA, MILLIS, MINUTES, MONTHS, NANOS, SECONDS, WEEKS, YEARS.

timeZoneStrategy.description: Specifies the strategy for determining the time zone for the delay.

adNetwork.description: Specifies the ad network associated with the ads search filter.

entityType.description: Specifies the type of entity involved in the ads search filter.

filterType.description: Indicates the type of filter, which defaults to ADS_SEARCH.

operator.description: Defines the operator used in the ads search filter.

searchTermType.description: Indicates the type of search terms used in the ads search filter.

hour.description: The hour component of the time in the today reference.

millisecond.description: The millisecond component of the time in the today reference.

minute.description: The minute component of the time in the today reference.

referenceType.description: Indicates the type of reference, defaulting to 'TODAY'.

second.description: The second component of the time in the today reference.

hour.description: The hour component of the current time reference.

millisecond.description: The millisecond component of the current time reference.

minute.description: The minute component of the current time reference.

referenceType.description: Indicates the type of reference, defaulting to 'NOW'.

second.description: The second component of the current time reference.

flowId.description: The unique identifier for the automation flow.

type.description: Specifies the type of coordinate:FLOW_ID.
Specifies the type of unenrollment setting, with possible values being ALL or SELECTIVE.

associationCategory.description: Defines the category of the association, with possible values being HUBSPOT_DEFINED, INTEGRATOR_DEFINED, or USER_DEFINED.

associationTypeId.description: The ID representing the type of association.

name.description: The name of the data source.

objectTypeId.description: Represents the ID of the object type associated with the data source.

type.description: Indicates the type of data source, which defaults to ASSOCIATION.

completedAt.description: The date and time when the batch process was completed, formatted as a date-time string.

links.description: A collection of URLs related to the batch process.

requestedAt.description: The date and time when the batch request was initiated, formatted as a date-time string.

startedAt.description: The date and time when the batch process began, formatted as a date-time string.

status.description: The current status of the batch process, with possible values: CANCELED, COMPLETE, PENDING, PROCESSING.

branchValue.description: Specifies the value associated with the static branch.

filterBranchOperator.description: Defines the logical operator used to combine multiple filter branches.

filterBranchType.description: Indicates the type of filter branch, defaulting to RESTRICTED.

day.description: The day component of the month reference, represented as an integer.

hour.description: The hour component of the time in the month reference.

millisecond.description: The millisecond component of the time in the month reference.

minute.description: The minute component of the time in the month reference.

referenceType.description: Indicates the type of reference, defaulting to 'MONTH'.

second.description: The second component of the time in the month reference.

includeObjectsWithNoValueSet.description: Determines if objects without a set value should be included in the operation.

operationType.description: Specifies the type of operation, which defaults to 'DATETIME'.

operator.description: Defines the operator used in the date-time property operation.

requiresTimeZoneConversion.description: Indicates whether time zone conversion is needed for the operation.

timestamp.description: Specifies the timestamp involved in the date-time property operation.

campaignId.description: The identifier for the campaign used in the campaign influenced filter.

filterType.description: Indicates the type of filter, which defaults to CAMPAIGN_INFLUENCED.

day.description: The day component of the fiscal quarter reference, represented as an integer.

hour.description: The hour component of the time in the fiscal quarter reference.

millisecond.description: The millisecond component of the time in the fiscal quarter reference.

minute.description: The minute component of the time in the fiscal quarter reference.

month.description: The month component of the fiscal quarter reference, represented as an integer.

referenceType.description: Indicates the type of reference, defaulting to 'FISCAL_QUARTER'.

second.description: The second component of the time in the fiscal quarter reference.

completedAt.description: The date and time when the batch process was completed, formatted as a date-time string.

links.description: A collection of URLs related to the batch process.

numErrors.description: The total number of errors encountered during the batch process.

requestedAt.description: The date and time when the batch request was initiated, formatted as a date-time string.

startedAt.description: The date and time when the batch process began, formatted as a date-time string.

status.description: The current status of the batch process, with possible values: CANCELED, COMPLETE, PENDING, PROCESSING.

dayOfMonth.description: The day of the month for the yearly enrollment schedule.

month.description: The month for the yearly enrollment schedule, with accepted values including: APRIL, AUGUST, DECEMBER, FEBRUARY, JANUARY, JULY, JUNE, MARCH, MAY, NOVEMBER, OCTOBER, SEPTEMBER.

type.description: Indicates the type of enrollment schedule, which defaults to 'YEARLY'.

monthlyRelativeDays.description: One of the possible relative days to enroll can be: LAST_DAY_OF_MONTH, or FIRST_MONDAY_OF_MONTH

type.description: The type of schedule, always: MONTHLY_RELATIVE_DAYS

context.description: Context information about where the error originted

correlationId.description: The internal correlationId of the failed request.

example.message: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

appId.description: The HubSpot appId that is being used to auth this webhook call

type.description: The type of auth: SIGNATURE

includeObjectsWithNoValueSet.description: Indicates whether objects without a value set should be included.

operationType.description: Specifies the type of operation, which defaults to 'BOOL'.

operator.description: Defines the operator used in the boolean property operation.

value.description: The boolean value involved in the operation.

includeObjectsWithNoValueSet.description: Indicates whether objects without a value set should be included.

operationType.description: Specifies the type of operation, which defaults to 'ALL_PROPERTY'.

operator.description: Defines the operator used in the all property types operation.

after.description: A paging cursor token for retrieving subsequent pages.

link.description: A URL that can be used to retrieve the next page results.

NextPage.description: Specifies the paging information needed to retrieve the next set of results in a paginated API response

scopes.automation: Read from and write to my Workflows
